name.ch: 影像紀錄製作基礎課程

department.en: Department of Hakka Language and Social Sciences
department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系

remark.ch: 需自備數位相機（具有錄影功能即可）或是可拍攝影像的手機

goal.en: "1. enable students to understand the development of the digital age in imaging survey and basic concepts 2. Establish image propagation mode of communication 3. Know the image recording mode 4. To improve the ability to appreciate the spread of modern youth image 5. Promotion of visual language literacy, the ability to integrate with the interdisciplinary and inter-related to the employment of auxiliary future ready"
goal.ch: "1. 使學生了解數位時代中影像發展概況及相關的基本概念 2. 建立影像傳播溝通模式 3. 瞭解在影像記錄模式 4. 提高現代青年對影像傳播的鑑賞能力 5. 增進影像語言素養,與跨科際整合能力及輔助未來相關就業之準備"

content.en:
"? The image aesthetics
? Photography Introduction
? The image of strength
? Documentary Production and Management
? Fieldwork and record
? Planning and scripting documentaries
? Documentary aesthetic appreciation and dialogue
? Basic Photography Tips
? Introduction of post-production editing"
content.ch:
"? 影像美學
? 攝影概論
? 影像的力量
? 紀錄片製作與管理
? 田野調查與紀錄
? 紀錄片企劃與腳本撰寫
? 紀錄片美學賞析與對話
? 基礎攝影技巧
? 後製剪輯概論"

textbook.en: "1. The use of classroom handouts 2. Reference Books: a. Video recording b. 卡提耶布列松 century cultural moment Rolling Stones"
textbook.ch: "1. 採用課堂講義 2. 參考書籍: a. 影像記錄 b. 卡提耶佈列松 世紀一瞬間 滾石文化"

grading.en: "Exercise jobs 20% Class participation 20% Midterm 30% Final Exam 30% Midterm thematic photography, video production work for final exam"
grading.ch: "練習作業 20% 課堂參與 20% 期中考 30% 期末考 30% 期中考為專題攝影作品，期末考為影像製作作品。"
